topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545c19006368726427b80100#post_545c19006368726427b80100
Being an island nation that fought against westernization for a century only to finally embrace with very little context will do that to you. It also has it's roots in the etiquette and propriety demanded in pre-westernized Japan.

topics.body:
You know
As much as I talk about sex and how much I want to have it
I really am scared of having it
Like I worry that I'll only last like a minute
Or that won't actually be able to pleasure my partner 
I just don't want to be disappointing
